title: Vice President of Strategic Partnerships and Growth

description:
Join Our Forward-Thinking Media and Technology Team

Welcome to our company, a Fortune 50 ranker at the forefront of media and technology. We are committed to providing premier entertainment and online experiences to customers worldwide. Our dynamic team of innovators drives groundbreaking products and services, shaping the future of media and technology. If you are passionate about teamwork, innovation, and leading the way in this dynamic industry, we invite you to consider a career with us.

Role Overview

As the Vice President of Business Development within our Strategic Development team, you will play a key role in shaping the future of our company. Your responsibilities will include spearheading transformative partnerships, exploring new growth opportunities, and contributing to forward-thinking strategies. Join us if you are ready to challenge the status quo, drive innovation, and craft new growth models.

Responsibilities
• Lead the sourcing, negotiation, and maintenance of strategic partnerships aligning with our short and long-term objectives.
• Collaborate with C-Suite and internal stakeholders to ensure strategies and deals reflect broader company interests.
• Identify new growth opportunities and product ideas by staying informed about emerging technologies and market trends.
• Represent the company as a thought leader in digital, media, and technology sectors by keeping up with emerging industry trends.
• Foster a high-performing team that encourages creativity and innovative thinking to capitalize on growth opportunities.
• Exercise independent judgment on significant matters regularly.

Ideal Candidate

We Are Seeking a Candidate Who
• Has a proven track record in developing business partnerships that promote innovation and growth through negotiating complex agreements.
• Possesses a strong understanding of media, technology, and communication sectors, including knowledge of major market players' strategies.
• Demonstrates strong leadership skills and the ability to manage and inspire a diverse team with creativity, collaboration, and positivity.
• Exhibits excellent communication abilities and can represent the company's strategic vision effectively both internally and externally.
• Is willing to be based in the Philadelphia area with flexibility for travel as needed.
• Is financially savvy, with experience in corporate deal structuring considered a plus.
• Holds a Bachelor's degree in a relevant field; an MBA is strongly preferred.
• Has a minimum of 15 years of experience in business development or general management roles within telecom, technology, media, and/or entertainment sectors.

Our Commitment to You

We value our employees and offer competitive salaries, commissions for sales roles, bonuses for non-sales positions, and a comprehensive benefits package designed to support your well-being.

Equal Opportunity Employer

We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace that considers all qualified applicants for employment, regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other protected status.

Application Process

Join us in driving innovation and excellence in the media and technology world by applying now. Your journey to impact the future starts here.

Employment Type: Full-Time
